author: Stan Schroeder
title: Tesla buys 1,255 ventilators from China and delivers them to Los Angeles
description: A few days ago, Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the company is considering building ventilators in its factories, given the dire need for them in many U.S. hospitals which are fighting the ongoing coronavirus outbreak. Now, Tesla has actually delivered the ventilato…
content:
A few days ago, Tesla CEO Elon Musk said the company is considering building ventilators in its factories, given the dire need for them in many U.S. hospitals which are fighting the ongoing coronavirus outbreak.
